title: [Cancer] A new approach to treating breast cancer kills 95-100% of cancer cells in mouse models of human estrogen-receptor-positive breast cancers and their metastases in bone, brain, liver, and lungs. The newly developed drug, called ErSO, quickly shrinks even large tumors to undetectable levels.
